name: block.Pull
description:
AIM: Guide Rob in his quest in locating his girlfriend Roberta  by pulling/pushing various obstacles through 11 puzzling stages.  

CONTROLS: Numpad to move Rob in 9 directions:

     * 8 - Up 

     * 2- Down 

     * 4 - Left 

     * 6 - Right 

     * 7 - Up and left

     * 9 - Up and right

     * 1 - Down and left 

     * 3 - Down and right  

R to undo move.  Escape to restart level.  Alt+Enter to enter full screen.

AUTHOR'S NOTE

This is my first released game, and first game jam : )  Made with GameMaker.  Inspired heavily by awesome turn-based puzzle games such as Sokoban and the Deadly Rooms of Death series.  This project began work near the first of January and was finished right before the deadline :D  I plan to continue work on this as I've had a blast working on it.  Please let me know if you have any feedback/suggestions for improvements or if you run into any issues...  Thanks!!!
